Room.Name: The Northern Path
Room.ShortDescription: You are walking along the northern path around the Barbarian Pits.
Room.LongDescription: To the east, you can see a small trading post which is set up to allow the wealthier barbarians to buy some larger sized armor to better protect themselves. Most barbarians tend to either go naked or just wear a loincloth. Very few are able to afford some of the higher quality metallic and leather armors. Furthermore, not many people actually make that large of size of armor.
